title: Product roadmap
updated: Update (tokens begin distribution after progress bar is full)

open-beta.title: Open Beta launch (internal community red packet)
open-beta.desc: Pilot within the community, conditionally open community integration; Test basic distribution/claiming and user experience
open-beta.accept: Clear rules, smooth claiming, key funnels are usable

multi-chain.title: Continuous optimization: Multi-chain + Points mechanism + Anti-bot
multi-chain.desc: Extension to multi-chain support beyond Solana; Points calculation and visualization; Anti-bot strategy and A/B testing
multi-chain.accept: Multi-chain asset identification is correct; Points and risk control are functioning normally

compliance.title: Risk Control and Compliance
compliance.desc: KYC/AML, Audit and Security Mechanisms; Abnormal Review Process.
compliance.accept: Enable KYC if necessary; AML rules are auditable; strong security logs

growth-integration.title: Growth: Community integration + API/Webhook + Ecosystem collaboration
growth-integration.desc: Integration guide, Event Webhook, Query API; Partner integration process
growth-integration.accept: Integration guide approved; Webhook/Query API is stable

token-moonini.title: Points redeemable for tokens: moonini
token-moonini.desc: Completion of moonini token distribution and exchange mechanism
token-moonini.accept: Rules for converting points into tokens implemented; Risk control/compliance checks passed
